channel.title: How to keep your computer clean of viruses
channel.description:
ok, i know this has nothing to do with private servers, but recently i've had a ton of virus on my computer and i haven't been scanning the stuff from [b]this[/b] website, so apparently people are giving out viruses, i had 5 trojan's and a bunch of other stuff. so im going to make a little tutorial to how to keep your computer clean.
[i]these next few things are to keep them viruses off your computer[/i]
first off, scan [b][i][u]everything[/u][/i][/b] before you download it, i don't care if its from someone you [b]think[/b] you can trust. SCAN IT! ok ill list a few site to scan a file before you open it
[ul][li][url=http://www.kaspersky.com/scanforvirus] Kaspersky[/url][/li] [li][url=http://onlinescan.avast.com/] Avast[/url][/li][/ul]
ok, there are a few more that are trusted but i just listed a few.
=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=
[i]ok, before you shut off your computer you need to give it a virus scan, or at least do one once a week.[/i] ok, there is a bunch of site's out there claiming they will clean your computer but they [b]don't[/b] so i will give you a 90-day trial (that i use, but i bought it, it makes backups of your computer, it does tune-ups, it istals update, and more, very trusted), i will give you a [b]free[/b] virus scan to download and you can use it as many times as you want, and i will give you a online virus scan that you [b]don't[/b] have to download.
[size=12pt][b]PLEASE NOTE:[/b][/size]DO NOT DOWNLOAD A ONLINE VIRUS SCAN ITS VERY DANGEROUS, ALSO, stopsign.com install's trojans on your computer.
[b]Online virus scan (no download)[/b]
[ul][li][url=http://nl.trendmicro-europe.com/consumer/housecall/housecall_launch.php] Trend Micro HouseCall[/url][/li][/ul]
[b]90-Day Trail (has all the features that i said above[/b]
[ul][li][url=http://onecare.live.com/standard/en-ca/purchase/trial.htm] Windows Live OneCare[/url][/li][/ul]
[b]The Free Downloading virus scan[/b]
[ul][li][url=http://www.filehippo.com/download/5acb4f0fd33caea3bd11221a4ce29828/download/] Ewido anti-maleware[/url][/li][/ul]
Creds: me for posting and the makers of these scans

a much more safer alternative is to use a Linux/Unix Computer.
Here is a complete list of rogue anti-spyware/anti-virus list: http://www.spywarewarrior.com/rogue_anti-spyware.htm

item.title: How to keep your computer clean of viruses
item.dc:creator: @h44ckzor_pwnage h44ckzor pwnage
item.description:
@h44ckzor_pwnage wrote:

Anti virus programs don’t always work, So don’t go to unknown websites, Don’t open/download anything suspicious. It’s more common sense that will stop a virus coming into your computer.

Read full topic
item.source: How to keep your computer clean of viruses

@pimping_one wrote:

ok, i know this has nothing to do with private servers, but recently i’ve had a ton of virus on my computer and i haven’t been scanning the stuff from this website, so apparently people are giving out viruses, i had 5 trojan’s and a bunch of other stuff. so im going to make a little tutorial to how to keep your computer clean.

these next few things are to keep them viruses off your computer

first off, scan everything before you download it, i don’t care if its from someone you think you can trust. SCAN IT! ok ill list a few site to scan a file before you open it

[ul][li] Kaspersky[/li]
[li] Avast[/li][/ul]

ok, there are a few more that are trusted but i just listed a few.

=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=

ok, before you shut off your computer you need to give it a virus scan, or at least do one once a week.
ok, there is a bunch of site’s out there claiming they will clean your computer but they don’t so i will give you a 90-day trial (that i use, but i bought it, it makes backups of your computer, it does tune-ups, it istals update, and more, very trusted), i will give you a free virus scan to download and you can use it as many times as you want, and i will give you a online virus scan that you don’t have to download.

[size=12pt]PLEASE NOTE:[/size]DO NOT DOWNLOAD A ONLINE VIRUS SCAN ITS VERY DANGEROUS, ALSO, stopsign.com install’s trojans on your computer.
